en_title: Secretary for Justice begins visit to Beijing
zh_title: 律政司司長展開北京訪問行程

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, started her duty visit in Beijing today (April 27).

Ms Cheng first called on the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office (HKMAO) of the State Council. She met with the Director of the HKMAO, Mr Zhang Xiaoming, and discussed ways to continue enhancing the exchanges among law students and legal practitioners between the two places, as well as the opportunities brought by the Belt and Road Initiative and the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Bay Area development.

Ms Cheng then met with the Chairperson of the Legislative Affairs Commission and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Basic Law Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Mr Shen Chunyao, to discuss issues of mutual concern.
Ms Cheng will continue her visit tomorrow by calling on the Ministry of Justice. She will meet with the representatives from the Mainland arbitration sectors.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師今日（四月二十七日）展開北京的訪問行程。
鄭若驊首先拜訪國務院港澳事務辦公室（港澳辦），並與港澳辦主任張曉明會面，商討繼續優化兩地法律學生和法律工作者交流等工作，同時談及「一帶一路」建設和粵港澳大灣區發展規劃帶來的發展機遇。
鄭若驊隨後與全國人民代表大會常務委員會法制工作委員會和香港特別行政區基本法委員會主任沈春耀會面，就共同關心的議題交流意見。
鄭若驊明日將拜訪司法部，並與內地仲裁業界代表會面。
